# LangChain Utils

A collection of utilities for Nancal LangGraph projects.

## Installation

```bash
pip install nancal-lanchain-base
```

## Usage

```python
from nancal_langchain_base.helper import graph_helper
from nancal_langchain_base.log.write_log import setup_logging
```

## Modules

- `error`: Error handling utilities
- `file`: File handling utilities
- `global_conf`: Global configuration utilities
- `helper`: Helper functions for graphs and agents
- `log`: Logging utilities
- `messages`: Message handling utilities
- `model_clients`: Model client utilities


### install
```shell
uv add --default-index https://cnb:1f1aad4b9F1qjJvxSeh3aN@pypi.cnb.cool/anke1938/ai/-/packages/simple/ nancal-lanchain-base==0.1.1
```
